definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ge 49:19 band, troop (as making inroads; others, as a division, detachment (as severed), but this usually later in Heb.)—´[[נ]] abs. 1Sa 30:8 + 19 t.; cstr. 2Ch 25:9; pl. [[ם]] 2Sa 4:2 + 2 t.; cstr. [[גְּדוּדֵי]] 2Ki 6:23 + 6 t.; sf. [[גְּדוּדָיו]] Job 19:12, Job 25:3; —

marauding band (making incursions, inroads, cf. [[גדד]]) 1Sa 30:8, 1Sa 30:15, 1Sa 30:15, 1Sa 30:23 cf. 1Ch 12:22, also 2Ch 22:1, 1Ki 11:24, 2Ki 5:2, 2Ki 6:23, 2Ki 13:20, 2Ki 13:21, 2Ki 24:2, 2Ki 24:2, 2Ki 24:2, 2Ki 24:2 cf. 2Sa 22:30 = Ps 18:30, & Ge 49:19 (v. [[גַּד]] Ge 30:11) Ho 6:9, Ho 7:1, Je 18:22; [[שָׂרֵי גִּדוּדִים]] 2Sa 4:2, cf. [[וַיִּתְּנֵם בְּרָאשֵׁי הַגְּדוּד]] 1Ch 12:19; fig. of God's attacking forces, his chastisements Job 19:12 (cf. Job 25:3 infr.)

troop, of divisions of army of Isr. (late) [[גְּדוּדֵי]] [[חְבָא מִלְחָמָה]] 1Ch 7:4, cf. 2Ch 26:11; band of Israel, i.e. troop of mercenaries hired from Isr. by Amaziah 2Ch 25:9, 2Ch 25:10; [[בְּנֵי הַגְּדוּד]] i.e. soldiers of the band 2Ch 25:13; of army in general [[כְּמֶלֶח]] [[בַּגְּדוּד]] Job 29:25, in sim.; also Mic 4:14 [[בַּת־גְּדוּד]] of Zion.
